'''Brown dye''' is one of the sixteen available [[dye]]s. It can be crafted from [[cocoa beans]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
 |Cocoa Beans
 |Output=Brown Dye
 |type=Material
}}

=== Trading ===
[[Wandering trader]]s have a chance to [[trade]] 3 brown dyes for 1 [[emerald]].
{{Trade sources}}
